name: dealerscloud-platform
description: Full-stack automotive dealership management platform with React Native mobile app, React web dashboard, and Express.js backend

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:web" "npm run dev:mobile"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:web
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:web && npm run test:mobile
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:web && npm run lint:mobile
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:backend && npm run install:web && npm run install:mobile

author: DealersCloud Team
